START.name: Steamworks
START.desc:
You are bombarded with the smell of copper and the sound of grinding gears. 
The air is thick with condensation, and you see dozens of pipes, steam tanks,
and countless cogs grinding away to their own rhythm.
To the North, a staircase leads down.
To the West, the rows of pipes open up into a narrow pathway.
To the East, a solid metal door sits on rusted hinges.
To the South, a broken steam tank the size of a small shack has a gaping hole in its side.

LOC2.name: Test Chamber
LOC2.desc:
You stand in the middle of a large empty chamber with metallic grates in the floor.
There are multiple scorch marks on the walls, and the floor is dented and gouged in places.
To the North, a large vaulted door sits below a rusted sign bearing the image of a skull.
To the West, a twisting hallway flickers with distant illumination.
To the East, a ramp curves slightly downward towards a copper door.
To the South, a staircase leads upwards into darkness.

LOC3.name: Pipes
LOC3.desc:
You stand in a cramped room full of pipes and valves. The groans and rattles eminating from them sound eerily alive.
To the North, a tunnel barren of pipes leads to an illuminated doorway.
To the East, a narrow walkway heads in the direction of several loud noises.

LOC4.name: Old Workshop
LOC4.desc:
The door swings open with an angry groan, and you enter a room lined with cobwebs.
Yellowed diagrams and schematics are scattered about the floor, and a dust-covered workbench has several rusted, soulless-looking metal animal figures on it.
This room has clearly been long-forgotten.
The only exit you see is the Western door you came through.

LOC5.name: Broken Tank
LOC5.desc:
You step inside the tank. Broken restraints hang from the ceiling, and several cords originating from the walls of the tank are piled on the floor.
It all feels oddly familiar to you.
The only exit is the hole at the North end of the chamber.

LOC6.name: Workshop
LOC6.desc:
You stand in a well-lit room that smells heavily of motor oil.
Freshly drawn schematics are organized neatly on a silver workbench.
Countless metal contraptions are mounted to the walls,
ranging from wind-up machines to anamatronic limbs that seem incredibly lifelike.
To the North, a staircase winds upward.
To the East, a network of hallways trails out of sight.
To the South, a narrow tunnel leads a chamber full of pipes.

LOC7.name: Storage
LOC7.desc:
You enter a stuffy metal closet. Dozens of broken, discarded machines are stacked or suspended around the room. Some appear vaguely lifelike.
The only exit is the Western door.

LOC8.name: Endless Sands
LOC8.desc:
You stare out into a vast expanse of rust-colored sand. The door slams shut and locks behind you.
You stare down at your hands, and notice the lifelike paint beginning to chip as you quickly start to rust.
You will not survive out here, but there is no going back now. Your only option is to Die and start over. Maybe the next You will be more lifelike.

LOC9.name: Clocktower
LOC9.desc:
You stand within the face of an immense clock. Gears turn all around you, but no sounds are being made. It is utterly silent.
The minute hand of the clock is missing, and the hour hand is stopped at twelve. As you peer through the fogged glass of the clockface, you barely make out a figure lying on the ground far below.
It appears to be surrounded by a pool of blood. Or is it oil?
The only exit is the South staircase.
